Title: Evil Bong 777
Writer: Charles Band, Brockton McKinney, Kent Roudebush
Actors: Sonny Carl Davis, Robin Sydney, Jessica Morris
Plot: EVIL BONG 777 leaves off where last year's EVIL BONG 666 left off. Our scowling weed-spewing Eebee is out of "Sexy Hell" and heading to Sin City with danger on her tail. She's joined by her whack pack of fabulous freaks: Faux Batt...
